1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Each of our stars mentors three up-and-comers, giving them the chance to make it on the big stage. Watch as the Crew take the challenge to mentor and select one suitable graduate from their group. Its a new ride and most exciting to date.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Macca convinces Mick to send the boys to Bali for some filming before they link up with 11-times world surfing champion Kelly Slater for an epic swell and sit cage-side as Richie faces his toughest opponent yet.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: All 'Ours' at night. Richie and Mark dream big and convince Macca and friends to invest into filming the lads surf deadly Botany Bay surf break Cape Fear - at night.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Recruiting the help of Red Hot Chili Peppers frontman Anthony Kiedis, DJ Mickey Avalon and surf legend Bruce Irons, the boys' trip to America gets off to a good start but the run of good luck doesn't last long.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Offered an opportunity to open for Mickey Avalon in the States, Macca has a tough decision to make, it's the film or his music career. Meanwhile, Richie's fight preparation draws to a halt when Mark calls with news of mammoth waves on the other side of Australia.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Joel Edgerton joins the lads on the film but not everything is going to plan as Macca is offered a too-good-to-refuse gig that puts the film in jeopardy. Mark and Mick face their darkest fears.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Surfer wants a wife. With a big publicity build up to the Fighting Fear premiere, Mark does his bit for the team by agreeing to go on national radio to find a blind date for the big night. Australian fashion designer Peter Morrissey rescues the style for the premiere at the last minute.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: The boys travel around Australia and Europe promoting the film Fighting Fear at exclusive premiere screenings. But Richie has a freak accident putting his upcoming title fight in jeopardy.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Macca and Amy move into their first place together, whilst Richie takes on the title fight, and Mark surfs Teahupoo for the first time.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Richie is now one step closer to the UFC and takes a fight against a former 'Ultimate Fighter Contender'. Macca performs live at the Sydney Opera House with Mickey Avalon for the Oz Music Awards.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Reeling from the success at the Oz Music Awards, Mac considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level. Mark tackles his fear of public speaking at the Surf Aid Ball at Star City, and Richie tries out for the UFC Tough House.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: They left us hanging for more last year, now budding musician, Kid Mac, MMA fighter, Richie 'Vas' Vaculik, and big wave surfer, Mark Mathews, return to share the journey of their dream chasing adventures in 'The Crew' Season 2.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: The boys are back for Season 2. In this episode Mark surfs Shipstern's with 11 time world champion Kelly Slater, Kid Mac starts planning his wedding whilst working on his 2nd album and Richie prepares for a new fight format.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: The boys are back for Season 2. In this episode Kid Mac tours Canada with Mickey Avalon, Mark gets an international big-wave competition up and running with Red Bull and The Crew proudly become ambassadors for Suicide Prevention Australia.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: The boys are back for Season 2. In this episode watch Mark and Richie take on 20ft swells in Tahiti while Kid Mac tries to capture vision against all odds for the Cape Fear project.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: The boys are back for Season 2. In this episode Kid Mac proves hard work does pay off as his second album goes straight to the top debuting at #1 on the Australian independent charts. It's time to PARTY.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: In this episode The Crew undergo an elite fitness test with Body Science to get fighting fit. It's The Fighter vs The Musician vs The Surfer - who will be the ultimate champion?

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: In this episode The Crew hit Thredbo Ski Resort, as Kid Mac performs at Afterski Festival. Once back in Sydney Kid Mac plays his new track to millions of viewers LIVE on the Footy Show, but it doesn't all go to plan.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: In this episode The Crew go to China and experience the Great Wall - adrenaline style. The boys go to surf the infamous Silver Dragon Tidal bore, one of the great surfing challenges and odyssey's in the world.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: In this episode The Crew go on from China to Singapore for some sweet wave pool and sky diving action. Things are finally looking good for The Crew but Kid Mac takes off to Canada against team advice.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: In this episode Kid Mac is invited to headline the Playboy Mansion at its infamous Halloween Party. Richie is left behind as he prepares for the biggest fight of his life, his debut in the UFC.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: In this episode the crew's hard work is seemingly starting to pay off. It's time for Richie to take the world stage in his first ever UFC debut with the boys flying in to cheer him on.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: It's the FINALE for Season 2. In this episode the big day has arrived. Kid Mac is getting married. Best man Mark Mathews has run off to chase a monster swell in Hawaii. The question is, will he make it back in time for the actual wedding?

imdb.plot outline: Mesmerizing to the core, The Crew is a documentary series that follows the extraordinary lives of 3 best friends, each having their own personal journey to the top of their field, yet all intertwined in a fascinating display of friendship, support and adrenalin pumping action.
imdb.title: The Crew
plot: Mesmerizing to the core, _The Crew_ (qv) is a documentary series that follows the extraordinary lives of 3 best friends, each having their own personal journey to the top of their field, yet all intertwined in a fascinating display of friendship, support and adrenalin pumping action.::nicholas cook
